metadata.title: CVE-2023-0130 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in in Fullscreen API in Google Chrome onAndroid prior to 109.0.5414.74 allowed a remote attacker to spoof thecontents of the Omnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page. (Chromiumsecurity severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
